Name: vads-font-family-sans-serif
value: 'Source Sans Pro', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Roboto, Arial, sans-serif

Name: vads-font-line-height-1
description: From USWDS. Usage: buttons, navigation, and text not meant to break over a line

Name: vads-font-line-height-2
description: From USWDS. Usage: headings, introductory (lead or dek) text, no more than 1-2 sentences

Name: vads-font-line-height-3
description: From USWDS. Usage: short text (under 1 paragraph), captions, text with a very short or very long measure

Name: vads-font-line-height-4
description: From USWDS. Usage: short (1-2 paragraphs) of running text, especially with a short measure

Name: vads-font-line-height-5
description: From USWDS. Usage: a good choice for most reading text, especially text meant for extended reading

Name: vads-font-line-height-6
description: From USWDS. Usage: shorter text (1-2 paragraphs) meant to be distinguished from other page text, pullquotes
